summary: Completed initial testing of AI-powered allergy assistant website. Backend APIs are properly secured and functional. Frontend landing page and authentication flow work correctly. Mobile responsiveness is good with minor touch target issue.

minor_issues.issue: Missing CORS headers in OPTIONS requests

ui_bugs.issue: Button height is 40px, below recommended 44px touch target

passed_tests: Backend health check and API accessibility
Authentication endpoint security (401 responses for unauthorized access)
Landing page loads with all elements
Google OAuth sign-in buttons redirect to auth service
action_item_for_main_agent: Testing completed successfully for public-facing features. Cannot test authenticated dashboard features (profile creation, AI analysis, history) without completing OAuth flow. Consider implementing test authentication or providing test credentials for full feature testing.
